vv33:11.1: Anantaraṃ caturavimānaṃ yathā vatthadāyikāvimānaṃ tathā vitthāretabbaṃ → yathā ca tattha evaṃ upari sabbavimānesu vitthāretabbaṃ (bj); Anantaraṃ → itaraṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed)
vv33:46.1: (Anantaraṃ caturavimānaṃ yathā gandhapañcaṅgulikadāyikāvimānaṃ tathā vitthāretabbaṃ.) → etthantare pāṭho bj potthake
vv33:59.3: Anusūyikā → anussūyikā (bj, pts-vp-pli2); anussuyyikā (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1) | upaṭṭhāsiṃ → sūpaṭṭhāsiṃ (bj)
vv33:64.3: Akkodhanānatimāninī → akkodhanā anatimānī (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli2); anatimāni (pts-vp-pli1)
vv33:73.1: Anantaraṃ pañcavīsativimānaṃ yathā khīrodanadāyikāvimānaṃ tathā vitthāretabbaṃ → etthantare pāṭho sī potthake
vv33:91.1: Aṃsabaddhakaṃ → aṃsavaṭṭakaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1-2); aṃsabandhakaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed); aṃsabandhanaṃ (mr)
vv33:103.3: addasāmi → addasaṃ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1-2); addasāsiṃ (pts-vp-pli-a)
vv33:104.1: Imāsāhaṃ → imāhaṃ (bj); tāsāhaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr) | sutvā → sutvāna (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
